item.title: Hugo
item.description: Full Supported Languages List Alias(es) Here’s what I use for my urls: url: hugo alias: # aliases for multiple - post/hugo - But in order for aliases to work, I have to change aslias to asliases, save. Then change it back to aslias. Strange. Markdown All in One Hands down the best extension to use within VSCode is Markdown All in One. Paste links over text for automatic linking Continues ordered and unordered lists when typing Working Checkbox Items Add the below snippet to footer e.
